title: 977 Music
summary: Listen to 977 Music Online Wherever You Are!
description: 977 Music it's simple yet beautiful unofficial client for big and popular radio network http://www.977music.com/ , that providing an ability to listen to 11 channels of 977 music radio network. This network feature many live channels of free internet radio programmed by real human beings that you can tune in to any time. Their online radio stations always feature hand-picked selections of the best, most popular music from each genre that he feature. Whether you're tuning into the 80's Music station for the best of popular 80s music or launching the Today's Hits station, 977 Music has it all.Online Radio Stations Based On A Specific Genre- Today's Hits- 50s, 60s Hits- 70's Rock- 80's Hits- 90's Hits- Adult Hits- Alternative Rock- Country Hits- Smooth Jazz Hits- ComedyListen to Radio Online Wherever You Are!
descriptionHTML:
977 Music it's simple yet beautiful unofficial client for big and popular radio network http://www.977music.com/ , that providing an ability to listen to 11 channels of 977 music radio network.

This network feature many live channels of free internet radio programmed by real human beings that you can tune in to any time. Their online radio stations always feature hand-picked selections of the best, most popular music from each genre that he feature. Whether you're tuning into the 80's Music station for the best of popular 80s music or launching the Today's Hits station, 977 Music has it all.

Online Radio Stations Based On A Specific Genre
- Today's Hits
- 50s, 60s Hits
- 70's Rock
- 80's Hits
- 90's Hits
- Adult Hits
- Alternative Rock
- Country Hits
- Smooth Jazz Hits
- Comedy

Listen to Radio Online Wherever You Are!
comments: V good Very good. U can have all types of western music for free.
Nice app If only you could add skip button too ;)
Love I love this Radio App.... <3 5stars for you <3
I love this app, best app for music lover!
A great app that should be better known.
recentChanges: Update streams to align with 977 music
